attributes.action: Government to come clean on reasons for BBC Riot Drama Censorship!
attributes.additional_details:
We the people believe that the Government should not be in the business of banning BBC Drama.

http://www.rt.com/news/bbc-riot-film-banned-432/

We need to know the reasons behind this ban.

rejection.details: This was a decision by the courts and the details of who made the application has not been released.
